channel.title: Explanation
channel.description: Can anyone explain me how this code works i cant understand it really i know what is doing but how u put the cords for a certain area what cords you record and set? return absX >= 2360 && absX <= 2445 && absY >= 5045 && absY <= 5125;

item.title: Explanation
item.dc:creator: @farme farme
item.description:
@farme wrote:

[quote=“Epic Steve, post:6, topic:390861”]This code will return true if;

[ul][li]Your absolute X coord (absX) is higher or equal to; 2360[/li]
[li]Your absolute X coord (absX) is lower or equal to; 2445[/li]
[li]Your absolute Y coord (absY) is higher or equal to; 5045[/li]
[li]Your absolute Y coord (absY) is lower or equal to; 5125[/li][/ul]

NOTE: All of these have to be true AT THE SAME TIME.

Otherwise it will return false;[/quote]

thanks man

Read full topic

item.title: Explanation
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

This code will return true if;

[ul][li]Your absolute X coord (absX) is higher or equal to; 2360[/li]
[li]Your absolute X coord (absX) is lower or equal to; 2445[/li]
[li]Your absolute Y coord (absY) is higher or equal to; 5045[/li]
[li]Your absolute Y coord (absY) is lower or equal to; 5125[/li][/ul]

NOTE: All of these have to be true AT THE SAME TIME.

Otherwise it will return false;

is this 317? if yes
tell me where u want to spawn it and how far u want him to be able to walk… il give u the rite code
